1.content:
First off - The Basics

Our Heroes:

Assman:
Assman is a big, beefy, 20something guy with nice full facial hair, a nice big tummy, and most importantly- an ass the size of a small car and thighs to match. Even in his daily life, Assman's rear is two giant globes of manflesh, but that's just how he likes it. His suit is the classic spandex with speedo, boots, gloves, and mask. The dark red suit clings to all of his curves and his yellow-gold speedo has 2 large A's printed on each buttcheek. His chest has another big A in a diamond so no matter what, you know who's farting... bringing... you to justice. And he may be strong, but hauling that ass around gets exhausting... His "secret" identity is Nick McBiggin.

Assman's Powers:
Gale Force Fart - A hurricane force fart that can blast clothes off of anyone.
Farting Influence - A telekinetic power that forces people to fart.
Butt Bomb - A big jump followed by an intense smushing under Assman's rear.
Crushing Blow - Sort of like the Butt Bomb, but with an added, patented Assman fart.
Fart Flight - Crouch down, rip ass, zoom away.
Stink Bomb - A big, Gale Force Fart plus extra stench.

Butt Boy:
Buttboy is a chubby, 19 year old who lives and works with Assman. His butt is huge like Assman's but not as huge. He carries a communicator watch with him to alert Assman of any problems while they're out in the field. His costume is purple while his accessories are teal. Just like Assman, Butt Boy has things printed on the cheeks of his speedo - B's. His chest has 2 bubbly B's in a circle. His "secret" identity is Ryan Chubston.

Butt Boy's Powers:
Windmaster - A big, powerful fart attack.
Charged Windmaster - A fart that builds and bloats Butt Boy's gut and butt before blasting the bad guys with intense winds.
Butt Bomb - A big jump followed by an intense smushing under Butt Boy's rear.
Crushing Blow - Sort of like the Butt Bomb, but with an added, patented Butt Boy fart.
Fart Flight - Crouch down, rip ass, zoom away.
Gas Transfer - Farting at Assman allows Assman to absorb the gas to add it to his own.

Gadgets:
Gas Ray - A raygun stolen from GasEx. One setting demolishes gas, the other increases it.

Villains:
There are quite a few villains trying to get rid of Assman and Butt Boy. Feel free to design some too.

GasEx:
A tall, thin guy who dresses in black, shiny spandex with a big GX on his chest. He works to invent tools to stop guys from having gas and most importantly- enjoying that gas. He also tries to destroy all foods that cause gas, much to the dismay of Assman and Butt Boy.

The 3 Beefsters:
3 big, beefy guys who have little regard for other people. They steal, cheat, and lie, but are also not too bright. They're often caught in the act of something bad, but they're no supervillain. Assman and Butt Boy like to have fun making them get big and gassy.

Gaseouz:
A large, fat man who hates Assman and Butt Boy. He wants to be the biggest and best around so he tries his best to stop them from doing their job. While not truly evil, he does often resort to evil deeds to lure the two out so he can try to destroy them.

The College Fanboys:
Much like the 3 Beefsters, these pudgy frat boys do several small crimes to try to lure out Assman and Butt Boy. They mean no harm, they just want to see their heroes in action. They even like being farted over fences, into pools, onto roofs, and out windows if it's done by their heroes.

Rules:
1. This is a gay story. There are plenty of authors who do straight only so go to them if you want women in your story.
2. If you invent a power/weapon, which is encouraged, there should be a reason for it other than, "it's cool".
3. Inventing villains and side characters is fine and encouraged.
4. Posts should be quality. No one sentence posts or posts that just lead to more options.
5. This is a humor story as well as a fetish one. You may use it for a wank, but no adding other fetishes/genres that may not be appropriate for the story/plot you're adding to (ie- popping, baby, gender change, vore, etc.). If a villain/plot requires such a thing, make a judgment call and resolve it accordingly. I'm not opposed to other things (in fact I like macro, some vore, etc.), but don't derail chapters to include something not really related to what's going on.
6. Sex in the story is not discouraged, but don't make it what whole series of posts are about. And make it tasteful. *Wink*
7. Have fun!

Now, where to start...
1.title: The Basics

choices: Get someone to give us a ride.
11.content:
Late one afternoon, Assman, dressed in his casual attire, sat on his trusty, comfy, worn in couch. His enormous rump spread out to all corners of the poor thing as he watched the big monitor display videos from various AssmanCams placed throughout the city or police feeds. He yawned a bit and heard the door to the layer swoosh open and the familiar footsteps of his young buddy, Butt Boy.

The smell of fresh pizza wafted through the air as Butt Boy drew closer. He smiled and turned his gaze away from the monitors for a second to see Butt Boy carrying two rather large pizzas.

"Hey Assman," Butt Boy said, setting the pizzas down on a table full of wanted posters. "Anything going on?"

"Nah, nothin'. It's pretty quiet today," Assman said, motioning for Butt Boy to bring him a pizza.

Butt Boy waddled over and gave Assman one of the big pizzas, seeing the man's face light up. The bigger man tossed open the lid and pulled out a nice, wide slice, examining the toppings.

"Spicy pepperoni and sausage, mushrooms, and extra cheese. If anything does happen today, we'll be ready," Assman chuckled before wolfing the slice down.

With a mouthful of pizza, Butt Boy smiled and saw something on the monitor. It looked like the usual 3 Beefsters were out and causing trouble again.

"Hey Assman, look. The convenience store monitor," he said, swallowing his pizza.

Assman enlarged the video and shook his head with a smile. The clerk was cowering behind the counter, not used to dealing with the 3 delinquents. Other than that, it appeared that the 3 were opening cases of beer and chugging them down like frat boys at a party.

"Well this'll be a piece of cake," he said wolfing down another slice of pizza.

He grunted and hefted himself up with a loud BRRAAAAPP! from his giant rear.

"Looks like a job for..." Assman started, grunting as he flexed his belly. His street clothes burst off his huge frame, leaving him in his tight suit. Jamming his mask down, he smiled, "Assman!"

Butt Boy smiled, enjoying the sight of his mentor bursting his clothes off. He pulled off his own ill-fitting clothes, revealing his own suit, "And Butt Boy!"

The two blubberous boys waddled out of the lair and mansion and then to the street. Assman wiped the sweat off of his forehead as Butt Boy joined him on the sidewalk. It was a rather busy afternoon on the streets so the sidewalks were crowded. A few fans pointed and smiled brightly, wondering if they should go up to the two.

"Well, Assman, we should..."

114.content:
As Butt Boy turned to prepare for flight, Assman laid a hand on his shoulder and cut him off - "We should talk to our fans!" His face split into a hopeful smile as his young sidekick spun like a beachball to face him. "Come on, Butt Boy, we cause so much destruction in the city, we need guys like this on our side!"

"Assman..." The hero's trusty sidekick glared through his mask. "There's a robbery in progress right now. We've got a job to do!" He folded his arms on top of his spandex-clad belly, regretting the fact that he so often played the responsible role. Surely Robin never had these kind of problems with Batman?

His partner just beamed back at him with a broad, winning smile - the smile of a true superhero. "Come on, Butt Boy, look at them." Assman gestured towards the group of guys with one chubby arm. There were four of them, probably in their early twenties, and they were clearly trying hard not to act like star-struck schoolgirls. It seemed like all they could do not to giggle and blush.

"Oh... fine then." Won over, Butt Boy made a mental note to track the criminals' progress via the city-wide camera network once their fan meeting was over. His partner was making a good start, having stomped up the sidewalk to greet the four guys. His butt wobbled with each step, much to their delight.

Four nervous voices started talking at once, "Oh my God you're my favourite... we're such big fans 'cause... are you out on a mission we'd love to..." Assman was somewhat taken aback by the eruption of rapid-fire conversations and questions, stunned as he tried to answer one fan only to be interrupted by another. There was only one way to get them to quiet down...
114.title: Talk to our fans!

“No no.. Who wants a picture with Assmans face. I know what you really want.” He turned around so that each fan was now on in front of one of his massive cheeks. “Butt Boy, you take the picture. You, the guy with the camera.. why don’t you.. take a spot right in the center… the best spot of all.” He chuckled.

The third man took the place between the massive cheeks. Butt Boy raised the camera.

Assman chuckled again. “Alright.. everyone say…..” Bbbbrrrrrrrrraaaaappppppppppppp. Assman let out a terrifyingly long and loud stink bomb. The stench would be unbearable. They fans must have loved it. But in all likely hood, they would pass out.

The guys looked at each other, grinning like fools and nodding to each other. They looked up at Assman, eyes pleading for more. It wasn't everyday that this happened after all.

"Please, Assman?!" they shouted to him.

He turned around and bent over a bit. The low grumble built up and he smirked, knowing a bit one was coming. The boys all giggled as they stood before the giant ass in front of them. Soon, a loud, deep BRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPP!! blasted out and past them. They clung to each other, feeling the full force of the fart. Assman sure wasn't holding back. Their clothes flapped in the wind, hair was blown back, and eyes squinted. As the fart died down about a minute later, Assman stood back up and faced the boys.

"How was that?" he grinned.

All three were disheveled. Their hair looked like it did when they had woken up, clothes a bit tattered like they had been in a hurricane, and grins from ear to ear.

"Awesome!! Man that was... it was just... oh man," the skinny one said.

"Yeah... I wish at least one of us could do somethin' like that," the fat one said, absent mindedly rubbing his gut.

"Well you know boys...

Evening time always means dinner time for our two big butted heroes. They had lumbered their way, in their casual, everyday clothes of course, to the pizza place near Assman's mansion.

"Evenin' fellas," said the man behind the counter who was tossing some dough. "The usual I bet?"

Assman smiled and nodded, jiggling his way over to the booth made especially for him and Butt Boy. The benches were wide and plush for their big rears while the tables were fitted to allow for their big thighs to fit underneath and their guts to fit behind them.

"Of course, Joe," Assman said as he and Butt Boy took their seats. "And I'll get a pitcher of beer. Butt Boy?"

"Root Beer's fine with me, Joe," Butt Boy smiled.

The two sat and made chitchat as a few other patrons came in and sat at their respective tables. No one even seemed to notice the likeness of the two big butted boys to the town's superheroes. Joe walked over and set down a big pie in front of each man.

"Extra cheese, spicy sauce, spicy pepperoni, and spicy sausage," Joe said before getting the pitches of beverages. "And the beers for you both. Careful boys. You're gonna get some major... intestinal... effects if you keep eatin' this spicy."

The two just chuckled and Assman picked up his first slice as if toasting Joe, "That's the point, Joey!"

He wolfed the slice down and went in for the next one as Butt Boy just smiled and shrugged innocently when Joe looked at him. They continued to eat as Joe went over to attend to other customers.

"So, As-... er... Nick, what should we do tonight?" Butt Boy asked his mentor before taking a sip of root beer.

"Wahahaha! When I'm through with all the stores in the city, there will be no gas-inducing foods left whatsoever! Almost immediately after the arms quickly filled the vending machines with hundreds of nutrient bars with bland packaging, the words "GasEx Bars" written across them in dull lettering.

"Not so fast!" the booming voice of Assman cried, halting GasEx temporarily in his tracks. The villain could only stare, then twist his smile into a sneer.

"Wohoho! If it isn't the Gassy Duo themselves! To what do I owe this pleasure?" he asked, giving a bow.

Oh no.. oh NO! I won't be able to get the smell off me for weeks.. Maybe I should just

info.brief_description: Come join 2 new bloated superheroes as they defeat evil and have a few laughs.
info.description:
Welcome to Metroville - home of the newest superheroes, Assman and Butt Boy. The city is just like any other. Lots of villains trying to ruin everyone's fun and plenty of big battles destroying public and private property!

Come on in! Read and add to their wacky adventures. It's a little bit fetish, a little bit funny, and a little bit adventuresome.
